name: Spaceship (gudtavosky)
description:
the spaceship.exe file was made in multimedia fusion 2, and has a boss, pickups, some shop upgrades, and sounds (music by www.youtube.com/user/sparkster7744), but when I switched to game maker, I tried to remake it, but stopped very early, as you can see in the space.exe file

mmf2: press SHIFT to shoot

gm: press A to shoot
